channel.title: Unable to recognise words through voice comand if audio file is running! – Politepix

item.title: Unable to recognise words through voice comand if audio file is running!
item.dc:creator: jainanoop
item.description:
Hi,
I am creating an application for iPhone. I am using openears library to recognise word through voice command so i get success on that.
My issue is i am unable to recognise word through voice command if any audio file is running on device.
This library provide these functionality ? if yes then How can i implement this ?
Please suggest me.

Thanks in advance for support.

item.title: Reply To: Unable to recognise words through voice comand if audio file is running!
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Greetings,

Sure, try some searching of these forums and the FAQ for information about coexistence and limitations with other audio sources. Searches that will be effective will be for the word “audio” and “session” and “mixing”.
